name: transformingAttributes(_:_:)
desc: Returns an attributed string by calling a closure that transforms one attribute, which a key path identifies, of a source attributed string.
declaration: func transformingAttributes<K>(_ k: KeyPath<AttributeDynamicLookup, K>, _ c: (inout AttributedString.SingleAttributeTransformer<K>) -> Void) -> AttributedString where K : AttributedStringKey
